@notice Soft‑delete a single file and decrement vault.files counter
         only if the file was not already deleted.

deleteFile(uint256,uint256).notice: Soft‑delete a single file and decrement vault.files counter         only if the file was not already deleted.

userdoc.notice: Users create vaults and register off‑chain files (by IPFS/AR CID).         • Vaults and files are “soft‑deleted” (immutable chain data).         • deleteFile() now properly decrements the vault’s file counter.
